verses.text: \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* ascend \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w idols|strong="H0457"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w moved|strong="H0935"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w melt|strong="H4549"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* set \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w the|strong="H0251"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* be broken \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* bowels thereof, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* cast down \w their|strong="H7130"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*: \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w they|strong="H7130"\w* \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* \w consult|strong="H1875"\w* \w their|strong="H7130"\w* \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w their|strong="H7130"\w* diviners, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w their|strong="H7130"\w* wizards, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* soothsayers.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w into|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w cruel|strong="H7186"\w* \w masters|strong="H0113"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3220"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3220"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3220"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* wasted \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7070"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w shall|strong="H7070"\w* fail: the \w streams|strong="H5104"\w* \w of|strong="H5104"\w* the banks \w shall|strong="H7070"\w* be diminished, \w and|strong="H7070"\w* be dried up. The \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* \w and|strong="H7070"\w* the bulrush \w shall|strong="H7070"\w* \w wither|strong="H2717"\w* \w away|strong="H7060"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* channel \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* laid bare \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* fountain, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3605"\w* \w sown|strong="H4218"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* water \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w* \w away|strong="H5086"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* fishers also \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w hook|strong="H2443"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w river|strong="H2975"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w lament|strong="H0578"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* nets \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w languish|strong="H0535"\w* \w away|strong="H7993"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0954"\w* shall \w be|strong="H5647"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* that wrought \w in|strong="H5647"\w* \w flax|strong="H6593"\w*, combing \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w weaving|strong="H0707"\w* fine \w linen|strong="H6593"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* watery \w places|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* dry, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* mourn \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* pools \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* fishes.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Tanis \w are|strong="H1121"\w* become \w fools|strong="H0191"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* counsellors \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Pharao \w have|strong="H1121"\w* given \w foolish|strong="H0191"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*: \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Pharao: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* ancient \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*?

\w Where|strong="H0335"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* thy \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w*? \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shew \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w purposed|strong="H3289"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* Tanis \w are|strong="H4714"\w* \w become|strong="H2973"\w* \w fools|strong="H2973"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Memphis|strong="H5297"\w* \w are|strong="H4714"\w* \w gone|strong="H8582"\w* \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*, they \w have|strong="H4714"\w* \w deceived|strong="H8582"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* stay \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* people thereof.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w mingled|strong="H4537"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* giddiness: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* caused \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w err|strong="H8582"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drunken|strong="H7910"\w* \w man|strong="H7910"\w* staggereth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* vomiteth.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, \w him|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* bendeth \w down|strong="H7218"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* holdeth back.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* unto \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* amazed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* moving \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* move \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w terror|strong="H2283"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w tremble|strong="H6342"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath determined \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w language|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w swearing|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sun.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* monument \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* thereof:

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sign|strong="H0226"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5707"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* oppressor, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* Saviour \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* defender \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w worship|strong="H5647"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w perform|strong="H5647"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5062"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5704"\w* scourge, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* pacified towards \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* way \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrian \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrian.

\w In|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* Assyrian: \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*,

\w Which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Assyrian: \w but|strong="H0559"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.
